root.title: u.k money market shortag forecast 250 mln stg
root.body: bank england say forecast shortag around 250 mln stg money market today among factor affect liquid say bill matur offici hand treasuri bill take up would drain around 1.02 billion stg target bankers' balanc would take 140 mln fall note circul would add 345 mln stg net effect exchequ transact would inflow 545 mln stg bank ad
